title: Moores Creek National Battlefield: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Operating Hours & Seasons Moores Creek National Battlefield is open Monday through Sunday, 9:00 am to 5:00 pm daily.  The park is closed on all Federal holidays. Areas of access include the History and Tar Heel trails, which include the battlefield and Widow Moores Creek Bridge, as well as access to the picnic area, creek, and restrooms. The Visitor Center is open Wednesday through Sunday, 9:00 am to 5:00 pm. This includes access to exhibits, the park's 10-minute film "In the Most Furious Manner", the gift shop, as well as access to America the Beautiful passes. Effective January 1, 2014, Moores Creek National Battlefield will be completely closed on all federal holidays with no access to any part being permitted. Visitor Center Phone Number 910-283-5591 ex. 2234
